results.name: Characteristic function of the lucky numbers.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100005
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Lucky Numbers
Index entries for sequences generated by sieves
program: (PARI) A145649list(up_to) = { my(u=A000959_upto(up_to), v=vector(up_to)); for(i=1,#u,v[u[i]] = 1); (v); }; \\ See there for A000959_upto(). - _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 27 2019
xref: Cf. A000959 (lucky numbers), A050505 (complement: unlucky numbers).
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 15 2008
